## Public Member Functions

### setIndirectStubsManagerBuilder() {#a9a821ccdd243900fb791319079728b2c}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename JITType, typename SetterImpl, typename State&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>SetterImpl &amp; llvm::orc::LLLazyJITBuilderSetters&lt; JITType, SetterImpl, State &gt;::setIndirectStubsManagerBuilder (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/lllazyjitbuilderstate/#a5b3291d514ce24e1e70b30d9c7eeceae">LLLazyJITBuilderState::IndirectStubsManagerBuilderFunction</a> ISMBuilder)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Set the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/indirectstubsmanager">IndirectStubsManager</a> builder function.

If this method is not called then a default, in-process <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/indirectstubsmanager">IndirectStubsManager</a> builder for the host platform will be used.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/lljit-h/#l00556">556</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/lljit-h">LLJIT.h</a>.

### setLazyCallthroughManager() {#a82c042423f9eebda0fc46dee8e08bdbe}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename JITType, typename SetterImpl, typename State&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>SetterImpl &amp; llvm::orc::LLLazyJITBuilderSetters&lt; JITType, SetterImpl, State &gt;::setLazyCallthroughManager (std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/lazycallthroughmanager">LazyCallThroughManager</a> &gt; LCTMgr)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Set the lazy-callthrough manager.

If this method is not called then a default, in-process lazy callthrough manager for the host platform will be used.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/lljit-h/#l00547">547</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/lljit-h">LLJIT.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### setLazyCompileFailureAddr() {#a7a500f0480232138cffea2a70eb31dda}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename JITType, typename SetterImpl, typename State&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>SetterImpl &amp; llvm::orc::LLLazyJITBuilderSetters&lt; JITType, SetterImpl, State &gt;::setLazyCompileFailureAddr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executoraddr">ExecutorAddr</a> Addr)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Set the address in the target address to call if a lazy compile fails.

If this method is not called then the value will default to 0.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/lljit-h/#l00537">537</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/lljit-h">LLJIT.h</a>.
